title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Rock mass classification, RMR and Q-system, stability analysis of excavation made in rock mass, elastic and plastic deformation, stress conditions, support requirement of a excavation under various types of rocks, numerical modeling of excavations. Methods for constructing underground tunnel, caverns and storage facilities.
